Through NYU's Museum Gateway, students get free admission to some of New York City's best cultural institutions. Browse the full list below, or see it as a map . Please note that the Whitney Museum of American Art will be closed until Spring 2015 during their move downtown.                                                    The Frick Collection                                 Free admission for NYU students (must present current NYU ID)   1 East 70th Street, New York, NY 10021   frick.org                                                                  Grey Art Gallery                                 Free admission for NYU students (must present current NYU ID)   100 Washington Square East, New York, NY 10003   nyu.edu/greyart                                                                  The Jewish Museum                                 Free admission for NYU students (must present current NYU ID)   10% discount at museum shop   1109 Fifth Avenue, New York, NY 10128   thejewishmuseum.org                                                                El Museo del Barrio                                 Free admission for NYU students (must present current NYU ID)   10% discount at La Tienda museum shop   10% discount at El Café   1230 5th Avenue, New York, NY 10029   elmuseo.org                                                                Museum of the City of New York                                 Free admission for NYU students plus one guest (student must present current NYU ID)   10% discount at museum shop   1220 5th Avenue, New York, NY 10029   mcny.org                                                                Museum of Modern Art                                 Free admission and film tickets for NYU students (student must present current NYU ID)   11 West 53rd Street, New York, NY 10019   moma.org                                                                Museum of the Moving Image                                 Free admission for NYU students (student must present current NYU ID)   15% discount in the Museum Café and the Moving Image Store     36-01 35th Avenue, Queens, NY 11106   movingimage.us                                                                  New Museum                                 Free admission for NYU students (must present current NYU ID)   235 Bowery, New York, NY 10002   newmuseum.org                                                                The New-York Historical Society                                 Free admission for NYU students (student must present current NYU ID)   10% discount at Museum Store   170 Central Park West at 77th Street, New York, NY 10024     nyhistory.org                                                                  Rubin Museum of Art                                 Free admission for NYU students (must present current NYU ID)   150 West 17th Street, New York, NY 10011   rmanyc.org                                                                The Studio Museum in Harlem                                 Free admission for NYU students (student must present current NYU ID)   10% discount at Museum Store   144 West 125th Street, New York, NY 10027     studiomuseum.org                                                                  Whitney Museum of American Art                                 Free admission for NYU students plus one guest (must present current NYU ID)   20% discount on Whitney publications and select products at the Whitney Store   10% discount at Untitled, the Whitney’s new Danny Meyer restaurant   Currently closed: The Whitney will reopen in Spring 2015 at 99 Gansevoort Street in the Meatpacking District     whitney.org                          NYU Faculty and Staff may enjoy free admission to several Museum Gateway institutions. For the complete list, please visit the Faculty & Staff Access page.                                         Visit the Grey Art Gallery   Located on Washington Square East, the Grey Art Gallery is the university's fine arts museum and is always free to the NYU community. Click here to find out more.                                       Planning a Group Visit?   If you are planning a free group trip to one of the Museum Gateway institutions listed above, please contact the museum directly to arrange your visit ahead of time.                 Please note that the list of participating institutions is subject to change and may grow throughout the semester.              Discover Other Museums   Below are a few New York gems that aren't a part of NYU's Museum Gateway. Ticket prices vary — some offer special free nights for students, others require a donation of any dollar amount.            The Metropolitan Museum of Art   American Museum of Natural History   National Museum of the American Indian   Guggenheim Museum   The Morgan Library and Museum            American Folk Art Museum   The Hispanic Society of America   The Paley Center for Media   South Street Seaport Museum   Cooper-Hewitt, National Design Museum                                                                      Faculty & Staff Access                               Several Museum Gateway institutions also offer free admission to NYU faculty and staff.     Learn More                                                                  NYU Gallery Network                               See student, faculty, and community art around campus. Apply here !            2013 Competition finalist, Keen Home Scored One of the Biggest Wins in 'Shark Tank' History.            The Berkley Center and the Office of Student Engagement kicked off the 2015 Langone Speaker Series with Devon Pike of Givenchy.            Semi-finalists, including students, alumni, faculty & researchers, across 12 NYU schools participated in the 13th Annual Venture Showcase.            Don't miss the Final Round of the $200K Entrepreneurs Challenge. Join us May 1. Register to attend here .                In a business world of non-stop change, there's only one way to win the game: Transform it entirely.    Our mission: To develop serial innovators capable of launching and leading organizations that challenge assumed boundaries and inspire a sense of what's possible.        – A Catalyst for New Venture Creation          At the Berkley Center, we provide students with real-world, hands-on startup experiences that complement the rigorous instruction received in the classroom. And we offer alumni, faculty and staff a platform from which they can leverage their professional experience and skills to launch new ventures or accelerate the growth of existing ones.    Each year, more than 800 aspiring entrepreneurs and early-stage CEOs turn to the Berkley Center for information, guidance and startup assistance. Take a moment to explore what NYU Stern and the Berkley Center for Entrepreneurship and Innovation have to offer you, an entrepreneurial leader of tomorrow. Apply here .   Grand Central Tech  GCT's goal is provide the best startups with the best resources at unbeatable terms. Accepted companies receive a full year of free office space, access to interns, mentors, legal/tax/PR/accounting services, in house recruiters, a global network of investors, and access to corporate partners.
